subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: About 30 players gathered this winter to work out with Mike Barwis, who operates a private gym at the Mets’ spring training home and is now overseeing the team’s strength and conditioning programs.
snippet: About 30 players gathered this winter to work out with Mike Barwis, who operates a private gym at the Mets’ spring training home and is now overseeing the team’s strength and conditioning programs.
